summary:
Thanks to TOXA01 for the incredible mesh/texture work.
This mod adds the FIXED and IMPROVED armor of Sauron; it's better, craftable and can be improved!
descriptionHtml:
First of all, a HUGE thank you to TOXA01 for the Armor.

Ladies and gentlemen, LOTR fans, players form all the wolrd, here you are what you've been waiting for ages!
The glorious Armor of Sauron, from the Lord of the Rings movies, is back again, in the Barrel behind Breezhome, but this time it is:

- BETTER: it has better stats than the best armors in vanilla game, so it will provide 1 more point protection and weight 1 less than Daedric for the Heavy version and than Dragonscale for the Light
(e.g. Daedric Helmet= 15weight 23defense -> Sauron Helmet= 14w 24d;   Dragonscale Helmet= 4w 17d -> Sauron Light Helmet= 3w 18d);

- CRAFTABLE: both version can now be crafted only at the SkyForge and will be in the Daedric Tree. To be crafted they both require the Daedric Smithing Perk; for balance I made a "more expensive" recipe, I raised the required ingredients by 1
(e.g. Daedric Armor= 1 daedrahearth - 5 ebony ingots - 3 leather strips; Sauron Armor/Light Armor: 2 daedrahearth - 6 ebony ingots - 4 leather strips);

- CAN BE IMPROVED: can now be improved (but it won't be cheap...however if you use the heavy version and have all the perks in the heavy armor skill tree you don't need to upgrade it since it goes beyond the armor cap, that is 567). Both versions benefit of the Daedric Smithing perk for better improvements.

...and last but not least, FIXED! :
- Now the Light Version works like a real light armor (benefits from all the perk of that tree, you can move faster, better stamina regen, ...)!
- No more the black Armor bug, check the screenshots!
- No more Dwarven Armor in the inventory preview for female Characters, check screenshots!
- Re-packed, you can now install it both manually or with the NMM!

Thanks to Efimius for his Video :)

[youtube]WUU3mKq5G_o[/youtube]

Weapons in the screenshots are all from this superb mod:
Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5727/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5727/[/url]?

Moreover I use a 1H version of the Nazgul Polished for Sauron. I created it for my own and I'm not sure I can post it. I've also created a 1H for the Nazgul one and a 2H for the Witch King sword. I'll ask permission to the author if you're interested.


INSTALLATION:
Put the the content of the .rar in your Data folder, should be:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Bethesda Softworks\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim - Legendary Edition\Data

Otherwhise -> use NMM


Don't forget to endorse and check up my other mods! :D : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39122770/?tb=mods&pUp=1]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39122770/?tb=mods&pUp=1[/url]


Cheers and good Skyrim you all!

Rirgaril
